description: Camellia transnokoensis is thought to be one of the most remarkable and majestic of all camellias. In spring, this evergreen shrub bursts into a vibrant array of hues, from deep purples to fuchsias and white. Its petite foliage is perfectly complemented by the abundance of showy and fragrant blooms. Not only does the camellia transnokoensis look beautiful, but it is also incredibly easy to care for, making it a pleasure for gardeners of all levels. Thanks to its low maintenance and long flowering period, it's no wonder why this camellia has become a fan favourite.
